sentence: Retrieve the details of all customers.
Show the total number of orders placed by each customer.
query: SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as num_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id;

sentence: Display the total revenue generated by each product category.
query: SELECT product_name, SUM(price * quantity) as revenue FROM orders GROUP BY product_name;

sentence: Retrieve the list of all orders placed by a specific customer.
Get the details of all customers whose last name starts with "S".
query: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';

sentence: Show the top 10 products with the highest revenue.
query: SELECT product_name, SUM(price * quantity) as revenue FROM orders GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 10;

sentence: List all orders that were placed in the last month.
query: SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= DATEADD(month, -1, GETDATE());

sentence: Display the average order value for each customer.
query: SELECT customer_id, AVG(price * quantity) as avg_order_value FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id;

sentence: Retrieve the list of all customers who have placed orders more than once.
query: SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as num_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

sentence: Show the total revenue generated by each customer.
query: SELECT customer_id, SUM(price * quantity) as revenue FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id;
